{"id":1473125369,"question_id":3653,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"11 months, 1 week","timestamp":1733627456,"status":11,"status_display":"Wrong Answer","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/1473125369/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Maximum Subarray Sum With Length Divisible by K","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int firstTrue(int l, int r, function<bool(int)> f) {\n        r++;\n        while (l < r) {\n            int mid = l + (r - l) / 2;\n            if (f(mid)) r = mid;\n            else l = mid + 1;\n        }\n        return l;\n    }\n\n    long long maximumSubarraySum(vector<int>& nums, int k) {\n        int N = (int)nums.size();\n        long long ans = LLONG_MIN, sum = 0, ok = 0;\n        map<int, int> cnt;\n        for (int i=0; i<N; i++) {\n            if (i >= k) {\n                sum -= nums[i-k];\n                cnt[nums[i-k]]--;\n                if (cnt[nums[i-k]] == 1) \n                    ok--;\n            }\n            sum += nums[i];\n            if (cnt[nums[i]] == 1) \n                ok++;\n            cnt[nums[i]]++;\n\n            if (!ok && i+1 >= k) ans = max(ans, sum);\n        }\n        return ans;\n    }\n\n    long long maxSubarraySum(vector<int>& nums, int k) {\n        int N = (int)nums.size();\n        const auto ok = [&](int p) {\n            if (p == N/k) \n                return true;\n            return maximumSubarraySum(nums, p*k) > maximumSubarraySum(nums, (p+1)*k);\n        };\n        long long ans = firstTrue(1, N/k, ok);\n        return maximumSubarraySum(nums, ans * k);\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"maximum-subarray-sum-with-length-divisible-by-k","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1,"frontend_id":956}
